android.notes:
• Sprinting to your phone just to see it’s a scam call — that’s unnecessary cardio. With call blocking, you can now automatically block scam and telemarketing calls. Simply head to Call Protection > Call blocking, select the categories you’d like to avoid, and enjoy your peace.
Available with certain subscription plans in the US, Canada, Japan, and the UK.

ios.notes: • Dark Web Monitor Pro™ has landed in the app! As hackers keep trying new tricks to break into your accounts, we keep sharpening our tools. Monitor up to eight email addresses, plus your credit cards and national IDs. Available with certain subscription plans.

android.notes: Our engineers have weeded out some minor bugs to enrich your VPN experience.

ios.notes: Your security is our priority—that’s why we’ve strengthened our encryption protocols and code. Enjoy the added security.

android.notes:
Hi Ghosties,

We did some under-the-hood work and chased away bugs to make your VPN experience with us so much smoother.

There's more where these goodies came from, so make sure to keep an eye on us.

Stay safe and secure!

android.notes: Minor UI and stability improvements

ios.notes:
- Choose your preferred city when connecting. Expand any country to see all available locations and select the one you want.
- Increases connection timeout for better robustness on unreliable networks.
- Fixes an issue when connecting to random profiles.
- Bug fixes and stability improvements

android.notes: Took the Bears to the groomers. Just love that New Bear smell, don’t you?

ios.notes:
What’s new in TunnelBear 4.10.1!
- Brushed some bugs out of fur.
- 0.6% more bears.

android.notes:
* Improved start up time.
* Added Reset password for Sso accounts.
* Added back domain for tunnel tests.
* Fixed preferred protocol fails to set from change protocol popup.
* Fixed IP address overlapping network name.
* Fixed disabled Static IP won't show as disabled in server list.
* Fixed Incorrect yearly pricing + discount in Turkey.

ios.notes:
Release 2025/12/23
* Fixed an issue where the wrong message could appear when using a voucher
* Improved reliability of pinned IP connections, including edge cases after reconnecting or signing out
* Fixed an issue where Static IP connections could switch to Best Location shortly after connecting
* Added password reset support for accounts created using Sign in with Apple

android.notes: - Fixed crash related to user preferences.

ios.notes:
New location view.
Port 443/TCP can be used for UDP-over-TCP.

ios.notes: We've improved overall app performance and reliability with fixes for the home screen widget VPN toggle, faster connections on captive WiFi networks (hotels, airports), and general bug fixes.

android.notes: We have rearranged your bottom nav items for a more intuitive experience, so you can get to what matters most even faster.

ios.notes:
Public Wi-Fi? We’ve got your back.
Auto Connect now auto-activates VPN on risky networks. You stay safe without doing a thing.

android.notes:
* Full compatibility from Android 5.1 to Android 16
* New and improved NetworkMonitor
* Improvements in ergonomics for faster and more comfortable use
* Updated OpenSSL, OpenVPN3-AirVPN and WireGuard libraries
* Ability to start and connect during the device bootstrap on all supported Android TV and Android versions, with or without "Always on VPN"
* Opt in ability to auto connect when the app is launched
* Updated code, SDK 16 100% compliant

Introducing the new VPN!
With your feedback guiding our strategy we worked hard to transform the VPN into an excellent privacy solution. We're excited to announce a major update that includes important improvements and cool new features.

The modern and visually appealing new look allows faster navigation and easy customization.

Double-hop adds an extra layer of obfuscation for those who take no chances in securing their privacy.

ios.notes:
Introducing the new Bitdefender VPN

Thanks to your feedback, we’ve transformed Bitdefender VPN into an even more powerful privacy protection solution. This major update includes:

- A modern and streamlined design for faster navigation and easier customisation  
- Support for the WireGuard protocol to boost speed without compromising security  
- New Double-Hop feature for an extra layer of privacy protection  
- Improved performance and user experience across all platforms

android.notes:
The new update has come. What's new:
- UI improvements
- Small bug fixes
- General improvements of the service performance

Enjoy your VeePN the same but somewhat better. We are ready to assist you with any questions you have. Don't hesitate to email us at support@veepn.com

+ Virtual servers are now indicated with an icon in the Locations list.

Stay secure with the fastest VPN for streaming, gaming, and unlimited internet access!

ios.notes: Protect your privacy with the latest Hotspot Shield VPN update! We’ve improved stability and security to keep your data safe and your connection strong. Stream, browse, and shop online with confidence — or upgrade to Premium for advanced protection and speed.

android.notes: Nothing’s perfect. That’s why apps have developers to fix them. We’ve tweaked some tiny things in ClearVPN and the app works better now!

ios.notes: Fixed some minor issues and known crashes to improve your overall experience.

android.notes: This update includes minor bug fixes, UI adjustments and other performance improvements.

ios.notes:
This update includes minor bug fixes, UI adjustments and other performance improvements, including:
- Subscription management has fully transitioned to the Mozilla accounts website.
- Regular key rotation, improving security in the event of extreme, unexpected situations.
- If you are using that beautiful new iPhone Air, Mozilla VPN should now look even better on it.
- Improvements on when notification permissions are requested when the app launches for the first time.
- The navigation bar’s message icon sometimes retained the ’unread’ indicator even after all messages were read. That should not happen anymore.
- Did you notice that the close button on popups was a little too low? It no longer is.
- Some exciting under-the-hood work to support a future feature.
- You can use Mozilla VPN in dozens of languages, and we’ve included the latest translations in this release.

feed.notes:
This update includes minor bug fixes, UI adjustments and other performance improvements, including:
- Subscription management has fully transitioned to the Mozilla accounts website.
- Regular key rotation, improving security in the event of extreme, unexpected situations.
- If you are using that beautiful new iPhone Air, Mozilla VPN should now look even better on it.
- Improvements on when notification permissions are requested when the app launches for the first time.
- The navigation bar’s message icon sometimes retained the ’unread’ indicator even after all messages were read. That should not happen anymore.
- Did you notice that the close button on popups was a little too low? It no longer is.
- Some exciting under-the-hood work to support a future feature.
- You can use Mozilla VPN in dozens of languages, and we’ve included the latest translations in this release.
